Parameters: SQLiteDatabase: the @B_android#database#sqlite#SQLiteDatabase_E@ object representing the database on which corruption is detected.
onCorruption(android.database.sqlite.SQL.Description: defines the default method to be invoked when database corruption is detected.

ClassDesc: Default class used to define the action to take when database corruption is reported by sqlite. An application can specify an implementation of @B_android#database#DatabaseErrorHandler_E@ on the following: @B_android#database#sqlite#SQLiteDatabase#openOrCreateDatabase_E@ @B_android#database#sqlite#SQLiteDatabase#openDatabase_E@ The specified @B_android#database#DatabaseErrorHandler_E@ is used to handle database corruption errors, if they occur. If null is specified for the DatabaseErrorHandler param in the above calls, this class is used as the default @B_android#database#DatabaseErrorHandler_E@.
